subtopic.name: General Form of An AP
information: a is the first term of the AP
a<sub>n</sub> is the n<sup>th</sup> term of the AP
d is the common difference of the AP

subtopic.name: nth Term from the End Of A Finite AP
information: l is the last term of the AP
l<sub>n</sub> is the n<sup>th</sup> term of the AP from the end
d is the common difference of the AP

subtopic.name: Sum of n Terms in an AP
information: a is the first term of the AP
l is the last term of the AP
n is the Number of terms
d is the common difference of the AP
S<sub>n</sub> is sum of n terms in an AP

subtopic.name: nth term if Sum of n Terms and (n-1) terms is given
information: a<sub>n</sub> is the n<sup>th</sup> term of the AP

subtopic.name: Arithmetic Mean
information: b is the Arithmetic mean of any two numbers a and c
